name: react_python_graphql_example
description: Full-stack application with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 9000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build:prod: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../api && uvicorn main:app --port 9000
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../api && pip install -e .

author: Your Name
